item.title: How to Build a Rolling 13-Month Budget in Excel (Step-by-Step)
item.description: Build a rolling 13-month budget in Excel. Track actual vs. projected spending month-by-month with automatic formulas. Includes step-by-step setup and formula references.

item.title: How to Set Financial Goals That Actually Stick (With Templates)
item.description: Master the science of financial goal setting with proven SMART framework, actionable templates, and step-by-step guidance. Stop setting vague goals. Start achieving measurable results.

item.title: How to Budget for a Wedding Without Going Broke

item.title: The 50/30/20 Rule: Does It Actually Work?
item.description: A realistic evaluation of the popular 50/30/20 budgeting rule. Discover when it works, when it fails, and better alternatives for different financial situations.

item.title: The Complete Guide to Tracking Your Net Worth (Why and How)
item.description: Master net worth tracking with our proven system. Includes free Excel template from FinanceCraftedSheets Etsy shop for automatic calculations.
